ILightSource Interface Reference

import "Imaris.idl";

Inheritance diagram for ILightSource:

Detailed Description

A light source illuminates all objects with a solid surface (Spots, Surfaces, Tracks, Filaments, Cells, etc.). A volume does not need a light source.
